results.title: Welcome Message
results.description:
<prefix>settings welcome <channel> <message>
Channel: Has to be a channel mention (#channel).
Message: The messsage to post.

You can add the following placeholders to the message:
%server% The name of the server.
%user% The name of the user.
%mention% Mention the user.
%count% Keeps track of the member count.

To disable welcome messages do<prefix>settings welcome disable.

results.title: Event Notifications
results.description:
<prefix>settings events <channel> <events>
Channel: The #channel to post events in.
Events: The events to subscribe (+event) or unsubscribe (-event) from.

These are the avaliable events:
memberjoined A user joins the server.
memberleft A user left the server.
userbanned A user was banned.
userunbanned A user was unbanned.
namechanged A user changed their name.
nicknamechanged A user changed their nickname.

results.title: Level messages
results.description:
<prefix>settings level enable <message>
To enable the level up message.

You can add the following placeholders to the message:
%user% The name of the user that leveled up.
%mention% Mention the user that leveled up.
%oldLevel% The user's previous level
%newLevel% The user's new level
%points% The user's points

To disable level messages do<prefix>settings level disable.
